featureName: Fix Playwright Browser Installation for health-mvp (firefox)
description: Fix Firefox browser installation failure in health-mvp Playwright job by adding explicit system dependency installation step.
note: Issue #31 COMPLETE (2025-11-26). Added explicit system dependency installation step before Playwright browser installation in health-mvp job. Removed libasound2 (not available on Ubuntu). All health-mvp matrix jobs now passing: chromium ✅, firefox ✅, webkit ✅, msedge ✅. CI run 19693282037 verified fix. Next: Issue #30 (frontend test failures).
